Bash(REDIS_URL=redis://nonexistent:6379 python -c "
from security import SecurityConfig, RateLimiter
import asyncio

async def test_rate_limiting():
    config = SecurityConfig()
    config.RATE_LIMIT_REQUESTS = 3  # Small limit for testing
    print(f''Rate limit set to: {config.RATE_LIMIT_REQUESTS}'')
    
    rate_limiter = RateLimiter(config)
    print(f''Using Redis: {rate_limiter.redis_client is not None}'')
    
    client_ip = ''192.168.1.500''
    endpoint = ''test-endpoint''
    
    # Test multiple requests
    for i in range(6):
        is_limited, remaining = await rate_limiter.is_rate_limited(client_ip, endpoint)
        print(f''Request {i+1}: limited={is_limited}, remaining={remaining}'')

asyncio.run(test_rate_limiting())
")
